elements.title: Gelli Haha: ‘Pluto is not a planet it’s a restaurant’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Gelli Haha: ‘Pluto is not a planet it’s a restaurant’

 Best New Music

LA-based sonic acrobat Gelli Haha takes a running leap into her arthouse theatrics with frisky energy to spare.

Aug. 25

elements.title: Ozomatli: ‘Red Line’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Ozomatli: ‘Red Line’

 Best New Music

Ozomatli is a band of activists who use music as a weapon for confronting inequity on their new song “Red Line.”

Aug. 22

elements.title: Marfa: ‘Little Miss Two Time’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Marfa: ‘Little Miss Two Time’

 Best New Music

Americana duo Marfa makes music that ties Laurel Canyon to West Texas. Their vibrant sound is a proverbial hay bale of beautiful harmonies and foot-stomping good times.

Aug. 21

elements.title: Say She She: ‘Under The Sun’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Say She She: ‘Under The Sun’

 Best New Music

Discodelic-funk-punk trio Say She She just dropped “Under The Sun,” a tasty treat from their forthcoming third album Cut & Rewind (out Oct 3).

Aug. 20

elements.title: John Tejada: ‘Until The End of the World’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
John Tejada: ‘Until The End of the World’

 Best New Music

“Until the End of the World,” the first single from electro-wizard John Tejada ’s forthcoming album The Watchline, is contemplative yet propulsive.

Aug. 19

elements.title: Grant-Lee Phillips: ‘She Knows Me’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Grant-Lee Phillips: ‘She Knows Me’

 Best New Music

Iconic troubadour Grant-Lee Phillips —best known for his songwriting achievements with 1990s band Grant Lee Buffalo—is just weeks away from dropping his 12th solo LP In The Hour of…

Aug. 18

elements.title: Hermanos Gutiérrez: ‘Elegantly Wasted (feat. Leon Bridges)’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Hermanos Gutiérrez: ‘Elegantly Wasted (feat. Leon Bridges)’

 Best New Music

What do you get when Hermanos Gutiérrez teams up with Leon Bridges ? “Elegantly Wasted,” the Ecuadorian-Swiss, guitar wizard brother duo’s first song ever to feature English lyrics.

Aug. 15

elements.title: Rebounder + Sofie Royer: 'Tennis Bracelet’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Rebounder + Sofie Royer: 'Tennis Bracelet’

 Best New Music

Sofie Royer spent a long time as the opening act for NYC multi-instrumentalists Rebounder . Naturally, they decided to join forces on the sexy new single “Tennis Bracelet.”

Aug. 14
